version_description: * Fixed a couple of crashes introduced in previous version.

* New and improved bidding view.
* Language fixes.
* Bug fixes.

We are excited to introduce some new features and fixes to the Auctionet app.

Features:
[+] Notifications are now visible under the notifications tab. Never miss out on an auction or an subscribed search.
[+] Followed searches are now sorted after most recent.

Bug fixes:
- Bug where some push messages wouldn't open the indended auction or auction search when tapped.
- Language fixes

* Relevance sorting of search results.
* Bug fixes.

* Fixed a bug where the total price calculation didn't display properly on slow networks.
* Fixed a bug where bidding history would sometimes crash in iOS 10
* Fixed paging of your active, won and lost auctions

* Stability improvements.

Previously in 1.1.9:
* Fixed a bug where the total price calculation didn't display properly on slow networks.
* Fixed a bug where bidding history would sometimes crash in iOS 10
* Fixed paging of your active, won and lost auctions

* Support for iPhone X
* Fixed a bug where some auction houses didn't show up in lists.

* The application no longer crashes when visiting old auctions
* Improved countdown time format
* Fixed a bug where some users lost their session and were required to log in again
* Fix auction house address formatting
* Minor layout- and bug fixes

The app now remembers where you were when you e.g. restart your phone.

We also made switching tabs faster after first launch.

We improved an error message and fixed three issues that could cause a crash, for example when attempting to save photos on iOS 10.
Fixes a known issue with showing confirmation after paying an invoice on iOS 13.
